titles.title: Directing the Committee on Government Reform to hold hearings on intelligence relating to the rationale for the commencement of Operation Iraqi Freedom.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 12/15/2005--Introduced. Directs the Committee on Government Reform, not later than 30 days after the date of the adoption of this resolution, to hold at least one hearing, and as many additional hearings as considered necessary by the committee chairman, in consultation with the ranking minority member of the committee, on intelligence relating to the rationale for the commencement of Operation Iraqi Freedom that was available before the operation began on March 19, 2003.
